segments.text: Would you check the engine , please ? It is knocking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Do you want to have the car washed ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , please . When can you get it done ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can pick it up in half an hour . By the way , how are you going to pay , cash or credit ?
segments.speaker: S2
